question: Which quarter shows the best company performance based on the stacked bar chart?

options.A: Q3 shows the best performance with the highest total value.
options.B: Q2 shows the best performance with balanced metrics.
options.C: The chart cannot determine overall performance precisely.
options.D: Q4 shows the best performance with the highest employee satisfaction.

explanation: The chart stacks unrelated business metrics (product sales, office temperature, employee satisfaction) into a single total. These metrics cannot be meaningfully combined to assess overall performance. Only individual metric analysis is valid.
